mapper.select: SELECT c.cust_key AS "cust_key", c.item_key AS "item_key", c.cart_key AS "cart_key", c.cnt AS "cnt", c.rdate AS "rdate", i.price AS "price", i.sale AS "sale", i.img1 AS "img1", i.name AS "name" FROM cart c JOIN customer cust ON cust.cust_key = c.cust_key JOIN item i ON i.item_key = c.item_key WHERE c.cust_key = ${sessionKey}
mapper.update: UPDATE cart SET cnt=${cnt} WHERE cart_key = ${cart_key}
